description: This file is a shell script used in a build framework for the RDK platform. It contains environment variable setups, configuration options, and functions to perform build, clean, install, and rebuild actions for a component, specifically handling operation related to uploading crash dumps.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Function to handle configuration steps, currently a placeholder.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Function to clean build artifacts, currently a placeholder.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Function to perform the build process, currently minimal.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Function to perform a rebuild, calls build.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Function to install files to the target directory, handling different device types.
